user_question: How many leave days do I get per year?
system_answer: You are entitled to 20 paid annual leave days per year. Leave requests should be submitted through the HR portal at least 7 days in advance for planned leaves. Emergency leaves can be reported by email to HR and must be logged in the portal within 48 hours. You can carry forward up to 5 unused leave days to the next fiscal year, but they must be used within the first quarter.
